channel.title: How to make items cost pk points (delta source 317)
channel.description: how do i make it so items in my pk shop cost pkpoints?

item.title: How to make items cost pk points (delta source 317)
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

In your source files you should already see something like this:[code] if (MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19 && MyShopID != 1 && MyShopID != 44) {
if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {

                        deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
                        addItem(itemID, 1);
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                        server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                        break;
                    }
                } else {
                    sM("Not enough coins for this item.");
                }
            }[/code]

Now underneath that piece of code add this:

if (MyShopID == 1) { if (pkPoints >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0){ pkPoints -= TotPrice2; addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough PK points for this item."); } }
You can change the shop id to whatever you want your shop to be that sells items for pk points.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make items cost pk points (delta source 317)
